name: Quinoa Pizza Burgers
description: Say hello to a healthier twist on pizza night with these Quinoa Pizza Burgers! Packed with protein and bursting with flavor, these burgers are a fun and nutritious way to satisfy your pizza cravings.
instructions: In a large bowl add the quinoa, beans, tomato, paste, and seasonings. Using a potato masher, mash the ingredients until thoroughly mixed together.
Take a quarter of quinoa-bean mixture and shape it into a patty using your hands. Repeat with the remaining mixture to create four patties.
Place the patties on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet. Top with mozzarella, and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Place the patties on buns, and top with tomato sauce, shredded Parmesan, and fresh basil.
